title: What's new?​
content: Models in the CacheObjects are reset to template properties upon [ObjectCache:ReturnObject]

title: Future​
content: More sensibly reset objects returning to the cache.Respond to feedback.

title: Object​
content: </> type Object = BasePart | Model  Generalization for things that are base parts or models.

title: OCache​
content: </> interface OCache { Open: {Object} InUse:: {Object}, CurrentCacheParent:: Folder, Template:: Object, ExpansionSize:: number } Description

title: new​
content: </> ObjectCache.new( template: Object, numPrecreatedObjects: number?, currentCacheParent: Folder? ) → OCache ObjectCache constructor.

title: GetObject​
content: </> ObjectCache:GetObject() → Object Retrieve an object from the cache

title: ReturnObject​
content: </> ObjectCache:ReturnObject(object: Object) → () Return object to cache. ObjectCache will attempt to reset important properties back to the template's properties.

title: Expand​
content: </> ObjectCache:Expand(amount: number?) → () Expands the size of the cache.

title: Destroy​
content: </> ObjectCache:Destroy() → () Destroys the object cache. caution This will also destroy all parts it is responsible for.
